citation: Proclamation under the Litter Amendment Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Litter Amendment Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Litter Amendment Act 2019 fix 2 December 2019 as the day on which that Act commences.

18 November 2019

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Minister for the Environment, Parks and Heritage

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 November 2019

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
